post.text: Law enforcement is a force for GOOD! They bring communities together and keep us safe. We must respect and stand by them!

comment.author: Taylor
comment.text: Watching Vice Presidential debate. Kaine is the rudest person ever interrupting and injecting, insulting and not telling truth. The moderator is weak and gets on Pence for doing what Kaine does with winks and smiles from Kaine to moderator. I am incensed at this. Kaine is as much a liar as Hilary Clinton. I don't usually write like this but the debates so far are clearly favoring democrats. The moderator lets Kaine go on and on and stops Pence. Disgusting

replies.author: Alayna
replies.text: Exactly..what's up with her, she's a bias moron, worse than lester holt....

replies.author: Crystal
replies.text: I am so thrilled to see that a large majority of the comments in this thread are being made by very well spoken, strong sounding women like you Taylor . God bless you!

replies.author: Colby
replies.text: "They can dish it out, but they can't take it" Pence got Trumped by Kaine.
